text: Aur kehte hain ke jo kuch in jaanwaron ke pait (bellies) mein hain yeh hamare mardon ke liye makhsoos hai aur hamari auraton par haraam, lekin agar woh murda ho (born dead) to dono iske khane mein shareek ho sakte hain. Yeh baatein jo inhon ne ghadh li hain inka badla Allah inhein dekar rahega. Yaqeenan woh hakeem hai aur sab baaton ki usey khabar hai
